Title: The Right Decision
Writer: Courtney Kemp Agboh (created by), Vladimir Cvetko
Actors: Omari Hardwick, Lela Loren, Naturi Naughton, Joseph Sikora
Plot: Tommy and Ghost get back together to take on a ruthless foe and enlist Tasha in hopes of evading detection by Angela and her team. Later, Tommy soldiers on, but Ghost comes undone at a vital juncture.
